DOC.brief_summary: This is a Phase 4, single center study conducted in mild-to moderate asthmatics.
DOC.brief_title: Non-invasive Measures of Distal Lung Disease in Asthmatics
DOC.detailed_description: The study consists of 3 phases. There are 7 study visits.
DOC.mesh_term: Fluticasone Propionate, Salmeterol Xinafoate Drug Combination
DOC.criteria: 1865 years old Currently using SABA prn or a lowtomoderate persistent asthma Tobacco use within 1 year or >= 5 pack years
